sections.heading: Appeal; procedure.Any person aggrieved by a final order of the director may appeal the order, and the appeal shall be in accordance with the Administrative Procedure Act
sections.text: SourceLaws 1965, c. 549, ยง 19, p. 1794;Laws 1988, LB 352, ยง 12.Cross ReferencesAdministrative Procedure Act, see section 84-920.
